name: PebbleAir
0:
”Alexa, make the Living Room warmer”
”Alexa, turn on Hallway AC”
”Alexa, set the Living Room temperature to 25”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the Pebble Air WiFi controller and Alexa, you can now interact with your Pebble devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Pebble Air account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).
